item.title: Fed chair Powell hits out at 'unprecedented' probe by US justice department
item.description: Jerome Powell said he believed the investigation was due to Donald Trump's anger over the Fed's refusal to cut interest rates.

item.title: Hungary grants asylum to Polish ex-justice minister
item.description: Granting asylum to a citizen of a fellow EU member goes against the spirit of EU standards.

item.title: Jailed Venezuelan politician's son says Trump shouldn't be 'fooled' by pledge of prisoner releases
item.description: Ramón Guanipa's father was accused of treason for challenging the disputed 2024 presidential election result.

item.title: Custody extended for owner of Swiss ski bar after deadly fire
item.description: Jacques Moretti is being held as a potential flight risk, Swiss media reports say.

item.title: Five decapitated heads displayed on Ecuador beach
item.description: Bathers found the body parts in Puerto López, a town which has been wracked by gang violence.
